adminify-notification-bar.name: Notification Bar
adminify-notification-bar.short_description: Gutenberg is now a reality. Easy Blocks is a growing Gutenberg Block Plugin. It’s easy to create multiple columns variations within a single row. Drag and Drop columns size variations gives you more controls over your website. We’re calling it as a Gutenberg Page Builder. If you are using Gutenberg Editor, then you can try this plugin to get maximum customization possibilities.
